title: PAIN IS MY PASSION
itunes:title: PAIN IS MY PASSION
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
PAIN IS MY PASSION! If you're still standing on your two feet, if you've still got breath in your body, you still have the strength you need in you. No matter what you've experienced in your life, you have to get through it. This is a message of hope and understanding. Let your pain be your passion! Powerful new motivational speech and our latest release with Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity). Music by Secession Studios (https://bit.ly/SecessionStudiosYouTube)

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
